CareerDescription: You are an agent of Sigmar, a tool to extract justice and divine the heretics from the immoral failures that are non-believers.

Assignments.Name: Inquisitor
Assignments.Description: The judge of heresy in the Church of Sigmar

Assignments.Name: Defender
Assignments.Description: The defense of the heretic in the Church of Sigmar

Events.EventText: Disaster! Roll on the Mishap Table, but you are not ejected from this career.
Find a new planet with a precursor temple. Unveiling new teachings of Sigmar.
Root out a Lawgar cult and have them punished.
Spend a term rooting out heresy on a city-world
While investigating heresy within the church, you discover a colleague is secretly part of a cult. If you report them, gain an enemy but +2 to an advancement roll. If you do nothing gain a Contact.
Life Event. Roll on the Life Events Table.
Have a ballad of your actions written for Sigmar and have it sung on a church world.
Spend a term rooting out heresy within the Islands.
Spend a term working on a church world, helping to train new inquisitors.
Spend a term rooting out heresy on the frontier
Condemn the wrong part of the scripture and be sent to prison for your heresy.

Mishaps.EventText: Severely injured (this is the same as a result of 2 on the Injury Table). Alternatively, roll twice on the Injury Table  and take the lower result.
Petty church politics gets you kicked out of the church. Soc 8+ to gain a benefit roll this term.
Accidentally condemn the wrong planet for heresy and be removed from the Church because of it.
Accuse the wrong person of heresy, causing the finance minister to refuse to fund any more of your expeditions.
You offended Sigmar himself with your heresy, and are removed from the church.
Injured. Roll on the Injury Table.

CareerDescription: The nobility of the federation. The people who legally own all the land an who have their own fleets. Waging war and messing around are their main passtimes when not playing politics,
Nationality: United Federation of Earth and her Colonies Among the Stars

Assignments.Name: Seated Noble
Assignments.Description: A noble whose territory is mostly managed by the federation

Assignments.Name: Free Noble
Assignments.Description: A noble whos territory has very little control by the Federation

Assignments.Name: Background Noble
Assignments.Description: A noble who really is just in the background, maybe a child of a noble, or a few branches from a truly important noble

RanksAndBonuses.Item2: Change Assignment to Free or Seated noble at rank 3

Events.EventText: Disaster! Roll on the Mishap Table, but you are not ejected from this career.
You spend the term playing in your masters court
You discover one of your advisors is corrupt, if you throw them out, gain an Enemy, if you keep them, gain DM+1 to a benefit roll.

omeone challenges your claim to your title, and you must defend it! Make a Melee(Blade) or Melee(void) 8+ check to defend your title or be ejected from the career, as a disgraced noble. (but you do get a benefit roll for this term)
A famine breaks out among your realm. Make a Leadership 6+ check to manage the famine or lose your benefit roll for this term.
Life Event. Roll on the Life Events Table.

Spend the term waging war against a nearby noble for their land. Make a Leadership 8+ check, if successful you win the war, and gain +2 to your advance roll and an enemy. If you fail, gain a rival and -1 to a benefit roll.
A small revolution breaks out within your domain. Resolve with a Leadership 8+ check. On Success you gain +1 to a benefit roll. On Failure you lose a benefit roll for this term.
You spend the term indulging in a hobby. Gain a skill of your choice except Jack of All Trades or Luck.
You discover someone at court has been plotting against you. Make a Carouse or Leadership 8+ check to convince them to gain their ways. Otherwise gain an Enemy.
Your newest policy is a smashing success! advance one level your highness.

Mishaps.EventText: Severely injured (this is the same as a result of 2 on the Injury Table). Alternatively, roll twice on the Injury Table  and take the lower result
Go on a raging bender and wind up stealing one your direct above nobles prized vehicles. You lose your title.
Your people hold a small revolution. You put it down the wrong way. Firing several of your ministers wasn’t enough. Gain D3 enemies and lose your title.
After going on a spending spree, you run out of money and are forced to abdicate your title.
Lose a war against another noble and lose your title
Injured. Roll on the Injury Table.

CareerDescription: You chose to serve your Lord, either seeking a title yourself, or maybe just the better pay/benefits or merely the idea of serving in some  kind of war NOW intrigues you. Whatever the reason, you’re here now.
Nationality: United Federation of Earth and her Colonies Among the Stars

Assignments.Name: Lord's Army
Assignments.Description: You choose to serve your Lord by fighting his ground battles, taking new claims and kingdoms for him from the wrongful holders of their titles.

Assignments.Name: Lords Navy
Assignments.Description: The defends of the space around the Lords planets. The Lords navies are often more advanced than their federation counterpart, and see much more action.

Assignments.Name: Lords Marines
Assignments.Description: The marines of the lord. Dealing death wherever they are deployed. Most often from the navy to board other lords ships and take them over or disable key systems.

Events.EventText: Disaster! Roll on the Mishap Table, but you are not ejected from this career.
You are assigned into a meat grinder battlefield, getting a training and a trial by fire. Make a Gun Combat 8+ to gain +1 to your advance roll for this term.
You are assigned to system defense. Pirates besiege the system. Make a Gunnery 8+ or Gun Combat 8+ check or make a roll on the injury table.
You are assigned to a horrid space station where seemingly every vice is embraced by the populus. You spend every day working hard to try and make a dent in the crime. You gain Streetwise

You are assigned to convoy defense and the pirates can’t seem to stop coming for you. Make either a Gunnery 8+ or Gun Combat 8+ check. On Success gain another level in the used skill. On Failure roll on the injury table.
Life Event. Roll on the Life Events Table.

Your ship spends the term hosting art displays and science exhibits for school and other groups to come and explore. Make a Carouse 6+ check, if successful, you schmooze the guests and gain Soc +1 as well as DM+1 to your advance roll. If you fail, you gain DM-1 on you next advance roll for making an embarrassment of your Lord.
You are assigned to convoy defense. It is uneventful as pirates seem to forget about you.
You are assigned to planet defense of a core world. Local and system police deal with all the actual incidents allowing you to learn one skill besides Jack of All Trades or Luck.
You are assigned to a station for the term, you spend it dealing with minor incidents but nothing too exciting.
Be assigned to a remote area on border patrol where nothing interesting happens. You get to know your crewmates well and gain  1D3 contacts.

Mishaps.EventText: Severely injured (this is the same as a result of 2 on the Injury Table). Alternatively, roll twice on the Injury Table  and take the lower result
Be left behind after a failed siege. Branded dead back home.
You are part of a particularly bloody offensive, afterwhich the unit you’re serving in was disbanded
Your superior officer attempts to convince you to take inappropriate actions. IF you do, gain an ally and a benefit roll this term. If you don’t you leave with your honour in tact but gain an enemy
Your unit is wiped out during a rival nobles raid, except you. You are given leave due to PTSD
Injured. Roll on the Injury Table.

CareerDescription: Sigmarines are the soldiers of the church of Sigmar within the Deutschland. Trained from a young age in the art of warfare, these elite men are closer to beasts of war then men of a civilized age. Their strict adherence to the code of Sigmar makes their loyalty unquestionable.

Assignments.Name: Trooper
Assignments.Description: Boots on the ground, rifle in hand, blasting the foes of the church with awesome precision.

Assignments.Name: Intelligence
Assignments.Description: Recon, computers, and all the work of dealing with the civilians that troops would sooner avoid.

Assignments.Name: Support
Assignments.Description: Bringing the big guns, the big tanks, and the big gunships, support is the calveraly on cocaine.

Events.EventText: Disaster! Roll on the Mishap Table, but you are not ejected from this career.
Your planet comes under siege, roll Heavy Weapons 8+ or Gunnery 8+ to defend it. If successful you are promoted for your heroism.
You are assigned to a planet with a hostile or wild environment. Gain one of Vacc Suit 1, Engineer 1, Animals (riding or training) 1, or Recon 1.
You are brought into the Order of Sigmoria and placed on a special assignment, gain either Gun Combat or Survival
The spirit of Sigmar has chosen to bless you, switch to the psionics career.
Life Event. Roll on the Life Events Table.
You serve on the front lines for a major planetary assault. Gain one of Recon, Gun Combat, Leadership, or Electronics (comms)
You are assigned to patrol a holy world. Gain DM+2 to your next advancement roll.
You discover your commanding officer has joined a cult, if you expose your officer gain soc +1 and an enemy, if you join their cult gain either dex +1 or str +1 and a contact.
Your battle barge is ambushed by a group of Pirates, make a Gun Combat 8+ or a melee 6+ to repel the boarders. If successful, gain another point in the used skill.
You display heroism in battle. You may gain a promotion or a commission automatically.

Mishaps.EventText: Severely injured (this is the same as a result of 2 on the Injury Table). Alternatively, roll twice on the Injury Table  and take the lower result
During a live fire exercise, your unit is slaughtered, you are blamed for being the sole survivor. Gain an enemy from within the church.
You miss prayer time and are assumed to be a heretic, thus forcibly removed from service. Gain an enemy.

During a battle you were key to defending an area, but the area was still taken regardless of your actions. Make a gun Combat 8+ or Melee 8+, if you succeed you get the benefit roll for this term. If you fail gain an enemy

Your shuttle is shot down while in transit, make a Dex 6+ or End 6+ roll, if you fail, roll on the Injury Table. If you succeed, you are still discharged, but gain one of Survival, Leadership, Medic, or Navigate.
Injured. Roll on the Injury Table.
